00042 // ===========================================================================
00043 // member method definitions
00044 // ===========================================================================
00045 long
00046 SysUtils::getCurrentMillis() {
00047 #ifndef WIN32
00048     timeval current;
00049     gettimeofday(&current, 0);
00050     long nanosecs =
00051         (long) current.tv_sec * 1000L + (long) current.tv_usec / 1000L;
00052     return nanosecs;
00053 #else
00054     LARGE_INTEGER val, val2;
00055     BOOL check = QueryPerformanceCounter(&val);
00056     check = QueryPerformanceFrequency(&val2);
00057     return (long)(val.QuadPart * 1000 / val2.QuadPart);
00058 #endif
00059 }
